text: Lu Guanqiu (;17 January 1945 - 25 October 2017) was a Chinese billionaire entrepreneur, and the founder of Wanxiang Group. He was the 18th richest person in China, according to the Hurun Report China Rich List 2013, The individual ranked as the 286th wealthiest person globally. and reportedly the richest person in Zhejiang province. He was a delegate to the Chinese National People's Congress. Lu died on 25 October 2017 in Hangzhou, China, aged 72. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2017 deaths Category:People from Hangzhou Category:Chinese billionaires Category:Chinese businesspeople
title: Lu Guanqiu
